body:
Just a small notice: new "Thermal Comfort Indices" component (VER 0.0.64  FEB_27_2017) collaborates with Ladybug ENVI-met components much quicker now.
What took tens of minutes to calculate, now calculates in a minute or less.
The same previous canopy example has been used to analyse PET index:

[](http://api.ning.com:80/files/YNoB9AsVnJ*9LSA7oCLuuSBLjR84WSmg0pGGuaIFNbYqxeyFPPgeo7YwEgaF5aPzfRD89XRko--eB20tZTQrikCriYO6HYCQ/ENVImet_PET2jpg.jpg)
As with the previous example, [ENVI-met simulation files](https://www.dropbox.com/s/1audy88vrm4zj48/ENVImet_Canopy.zip?dl=0) need to be extracted to "c:" partition in order for the .gh file to work.

Thank you once again Antonello!!
